text:
When adding a GlobalResource for use in the DefaultContext via ResourceLink. 
The resource is not available. However, if a local resource is created in the 
DefaultContext it is.
creator: asar.khan@reuters.com

text:
Can someone please look into this? All the advantages of having global 
resources cannot be fully utilised when such a bug exists!
creator: asar.khan@reuters.com
markt@apache.org
text: *** Bug 16116 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This works for me with the latest TC4.1.x code.

Note that the attached test case will never work. The global resource is called
globalValue in the index.jsp but globalResource in server.xml

Since there were a couple of reports about this issue, I am going to assume that
there was a bug but that it was fixed somewhere between 4.1.9 and 4.1.31.
